body_html:
We have the same problem, running the pytorch/examples imagenet training example (resnet18, 4 workers) inside an nvidia-docker using 1 GPU out of 4. I'll try to gather a gdb backtrace, if I manage to get to the process.

At least OpenBLAS is known to have a deadlock issue in matrix multiplication, which occurs relatively rarely: xianyi/OpenBLAS#937. This bug was present at least in OpenBLAS packaged in numpy 1.12.0.

body:
We have the same problem, running the pytorch/examples imagenet training example (resnet18, 4 workers) inside an nvidia-docker using 1 GPU out of 4. I'll try to gather a gdb backtrace, if I manage to get to the process.

At least OpenBLAS is known to have a deadlock issue in matrix multiplication, which occurs relatively rarely: https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/issues/937. This bug was present at least in OpenBLAS packaged in numpy 1.12.0.
